Song.title: Joy To The World
Song.copyright: Isaac Watts, G.F. Handel, Chris Tomlin, Ed Cash, Matt Gilder. 2009 worshiptogether.com Song/sixsteps Music

Arrangement.description: Arranged by Tim Schmidt and Ryan Anderson
Arrangement.text:
Intro: [C F C F | C G C ]
[C] All of heaven and all[F2] creation [Gsus]sing [F2] All of heaven and all creation [Gsus]sing [F2] All of heaven and all creation [Gsus]sing the won[G]ders of His love [F2] All of heaven and all creation [Gsus]sing the won[G]ders of His love
VERSE 1: [C]Joy to the [Am7]world, the [Gsus]Lord [G]is [Am]come! Let [F]earth re[G]ceive her [Am]King! Let [F]every heart pre[C/E]pare Him room And [Am]heav'n and nature sing, and [G]heav'n and nature sing, And [F]heav'n, and [Am]heav'n, and [Gsus]na[G]ture [C]sing!
VERSE 2: [C]Joy to the [Am7]world, the [Gsus]sa[G]vior [Am]reigns Let [F]men their [G]songs em[Am]ploy While [F]fields and floods, rocks, [C/E]hills, and plains Re[Am]peat the sounding joy, re[G]peat the sounding joy, Re[F]peat, re[Am]peat the [Gsus]soun[G]ding [C]joy
Refrain: [F2] All of heaven and all creation [Gsus]sing the won[G]ders of His love [F2] All of heaven and all creation [Gsus]sing the won[G]ders of His love
{new_page} VERSE 3: [C]No more let [Am7]sins and [Gsus]sor[G]rows [Am]grow Nor [F]thorns in[G]fest the [Am]ground He [F]comes to make His [C/E]blessings flow Far [Am]as the curse is found, far [G]as the curse is found Far [F]as, far [Am]as the [Gsus]curse [G]is [C]found
VERSE 4: [C]He rules the [Am7]world with [Gsus]truth [G]and [Am]grace And [F]makes the [G]nations [Am]prove. The [F]glories of His [C/E]righteousness And [Am]wonders of His love, and [G]wonders of His love, And [F]wonders, [Am]wonders [Gsus]of [G]His [C]love
Arrangement.searchtext: intro all of heaven and all creation sing all of heaven and all creation sing all of heaven and all creation sing the wonders of his love all of heaven and all creation sing the wonders of his love verse 1 joy to the world the lord is come let earth receive her king let every heart prepare him room and heavn and nature sing and heavn and nature sing and heavn and heavn and nature sing verse 2 joy to the world the savior reigns let men their songs employ while fields and floods rocks hills and plains repeat the sounding joy repeat the sounding joy repeat repeat the sounding joy refrain all of heaven and all creation sing the wonders of his love all of heaven and all creation sing the wonders of his love verse 3 no more let sins and sorrows grow nor thorns infest the ground he comes to make his blessings flow far as the curse is found far as the curse is found far as far as the curse is found verse 4 he rules the world with truth and grace and makes the nations prove the glories of his righteousness and wonders of his love and wonders of his love and wonders wonders of his love

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [C F C F | C G C ]
VERSE 1: [C]Joy to the world, [F]the [C]Lord [G7]is [C]come! Let [F]earth re[G7]ceive her [C]King! Let [C]every heart pre[C]pare Him room And [C]heav'n and nature sing, and [G7]heav'n and nature sing, And [C]heav'n, [F]and [C]heav'n, [F]and [C]na[G7]ture [C]sing!
VERSE 2: [C]Joy to the world, [F]the [C]sa[G7]vior [C]reigns Let [F]men their [G7]songs em[C]ploy While [C]fields and floods, rocks, [C]hills, and plains Re[C]peat the sounding joy, re[G7]peat the sounding joy, Re[C]peat, [F]re[C]peat [F]the [C]soun[G7]ding [C]joy
VERSE 3: [C]No more let sins [F]and [C]sor[G7]rows [C]grow Nor [F]thorns in[G7]fest the [C]ground He [C]comes to make His [C]blessings flow Far [C]as the curse is found, far [G7]as the curse is found Far [C]as, [F]far [C]as [F]the [C]curse [G7]is [C]found
VERSE 4: [C]He rules the world [F]with [C]truth [G7]and [C]grace And [F]makes the [G7]nations [C]prove. The [C]glories of His [C]righteousness And [C]wonders of His love, and [G7]wonders of His love, And [C]won[F]ders, [C]won[F]ders [C]of [G7]His [C]love
(17th Century)
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 joy to the world the lord is come let earth receive her king let every heart prepare him room and heavn and nature sing and heavn and nature sing and heavn and heavn and nature sing verse 2 joy to the world the savior reigns let men their songs employ while fields and floods rocks hills and plains repeat the sounding joy repeat the sounding joy repeat repeat the sounding joy verse 3 no more let sins and sorrows grow nor thorns infest the ground he comes to make his blessings flow far as the curse is found far as the curse is found far as far as the curse is found verse 4 he rules the world with truth and grace and makes the nations prove the glories of his righteousness and wonders of his love and wonders of his love and wonders wonders of his love 17th century

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [A D A D A D A D]
VERSE 1: [A]Joy to the world, the Lord [E]is [F#m7]come! Let [D]earth re[E]ceive her [F#m7]King! Let [D]every [A]heart pre[D]pare Him [A]room And [F#m7]heav'n and nature sing, and [E]heav'n and nature sing, And [D]heav'n, and [Bm]heav'n, and [E]nature [A]sing![D A D]
VERSE 2: [A]Joy to the world, the [D]sa[E]vior [F#m7]reigns Let [D]all their [E]songs em[F#m7]ploy While [D]fields and [A]floods, rocks, [D]hills, and [A]plains Re[F#m7]peat the sounding joy, re[E]peat the sounding joy, Re[D]peat, re[Bm]peat the [E]sounding [A]joy
Chorus:
[D]Joy, unspeakable [A]joy An over-[E]flowing well. No ton[D]gue can tell! J[D]oy, unspeakable [A]joy It rises [E] in my soul, Never lets [Bm] go [D]
{new_page} {key:B} VERSE 3: [B]He rules the world with [E]truth [F#]and [G#m7]grace And [E]makes the [F#]nations [G#m7]prove. The [E]glories [B/D#]of His [E]righteous[B/D#]ness And [G#m7]wonders of His love, and [F#]wonders of His love, And [E]wonders, [C#m7]wonders [F#]of His [B]love
Chorus: [E]Joy, unspeak-able [B]joy An over-[F#]flowing well No [E]tongue can tell! [E]Joy, unspeakable [B]joy It rises [F#]in my soul, Never [C#m]lets me go[E]. [B E B E B E B]
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 joy to the world the lord is come let earth receive her king let every heart prepare him room and heavn and nature sing and heavn and nature sing and heavn and heavn and nature sing verse 2 joy to the world the savior reigns let all their songs employ while fields and floods rocks hills and plains repeat the sounding joy repeat the sounding joy repeat repeat the sounding joy chorus joy unspeakable joy an overflowing well no tongue can tell joy unspeakable joy it rises in my soul never lets go verse 3 he rules the world with truth and grace and makes the nations prove the glories of his righteousness and wonders of his love and wonders of his love and wonders wonders of his love chorus joy unspeakable joy an overflowing well no tongue can tell joy unspeakable joy it rises in my soul never lets me go

Arrangement.description: Unspeakable Joy (Chris Tomlin) no key change
Arrangement.text:
Intro: [A D A D A D A D]
VERSE 1: [A]Joy to the world, the Lord [E]is [F#m7]come! Let [D]earth re[E]ceive her [F#m7]King! Let [D]every [A]heart pre[D]pare Him [A]room And [F#m7]heav'n and nature sing, and [E]heav'n and nature sing, And [D]heav'n, and [Bm]heav'n, and [E]nature [A]sing![D A D]
VERSE 2: [A]Joy to the world, the [D]sa[E]vior [F#m7]reigns Let [D]all their [E]songs em[F#m7]ploy While [D]fields and [A]floods, rocks, [D]hills, and [A]plains Re[F#m7]peat the sounding joy, re[E]peat the sounding joy, Re[D]peat, re[Bm]peat the [E]sounding [A]joy
Chorus:
[D]Joy, unspeakable [A]joy An over-[E]flowing well. No ton[D]gue can tell! J[D]oy, unspeakable [A]joy It rises [E] in my soul, Never lets [Bm] go [D]
{new_page} {key:A} VERSE 3: [A]He rules the world with [D]truth [E]and [F#m7]grace And [D]makes the [E]nations [F#m7]prove. The [D]glories [A/C#]of His [D]righteous[A/C#]ness And [F#m7]wonders of His love, and [E]wonders of His love, And [D]wonders, [Bm7]wonders [E]of His [A]love
{key:A} Chorus: [D]Joy, unspeak-able [A]joy An over-[E]flowing well No [D]tongue can tell! [D]Joy, unspeakable [A]joy It rises [E]in my soul, Never [Bm]lets me go[D]. [A D A D A D A]
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 joy to the world the lord is come let earth receive her king let every heart prepare him room and heavn and nature sing and heavn and nature sing and heavn and heavn and nature sing verse 2 joy to the world the savior reigns let all their songs employ while fields and floods rocks hills and plains repeat the sounding joy repeat the sounding joy repeat repeat the sounding joy chorus joy unspeakable joy an overflowing well no tongue can tell joy unspeakable joy it rises in my soul never lets go verse 3 he rules the world with truth and grace and makes the nations prove the glories of his righteousness and wonders of his love and wonders of his love and wonders wonders of his love chorus joy unspeakable joy an overflowing well no tongue can tell joy unspeakable joy it rises in my soul never lets me go

Arrangement.description: "You Are My Joy" Bridge - Play in key of A
Arrangement.text:
Intro: [|C |C F| C G | C ]
VERSE 1: [C]Joy to the world, [F]the [C]Lord [G7]is [C]come! Let [F]earth re[G7]ceive her [Am G ]King! Let [C]every heart pre[C]pare Him room And [C]heav'n and nature sing, and [G7]heav'n and nature sing, And [C]heav'n, [F]and [C]heav'n, [F]and [C]na[G7]ture s[C |C |F |F |]ing!
VERSE 2: [C]Joy to the world, [F]the [C]sa[G7]vior [C]reigns Let [F]men their [G7]songs em[Am G ]ploy While [C]fields and floods, rocks, [C]hills, and plains Re[C]peat the sounding joy, re[G7]peat the sounding joy, Re[C]peat, [F]re[C]peat [F]the [C]soun[G7]ding j[C |C |F |F |]oy
Bridge: [F] You are my Joy, you are my Joy you are my Joy, You are my [| C | C |]Joy! [F] You are my Joy, you are my Joy you are my Joy, You are my [| C | C | C | C |]Joy! [F] You are my Joy, you are my Joy you are my Joy, You are my [| C | C |]Joy! [F] You are my Joy, you are my Joy you are my Joy, You are my [| C | C | C | C |]Joy! [| G | G | F | F | G | G | F |F (hang) |]
{new_page} VERSE 3: [C]No more let sins [F]and [C]sor[G7]rows [C]grow Nor [F]thorns in[G7]fest the [Am G ]ground He [C]comes to make His [C]blessings flow Far [C]as the curse is found, far [G7]as the curse is found Far [C]as, [F]far [C]as [F]the [C]curse [G7]is fo[C |C |F |F |]und
{key:D} VERSE 4: [D]He rules the world [G]with [D]truth [A7]and [D]grace And [G]makes the [A7]nations [Bm A ]prove. The [D]glories of His [D]righteousness And [D]wonders of His love, and [A7]wonders of His love, And [D]won[G]ders, [D]won[G]ders [D]of [A7]His [D]love And [D]won[G]ders, [D]won[G]ders [D]of [A7]His l[D |D |G |G |]ove
Chorus: You are [D]glorio[Asus]us, [A] [Gmaj7]glorio[Em7]us And [D]we will lift our vo[Asus]ic[A]es to w[D]orship You [Asus] [A]You are [D]glorio[Asus]us, [A] [Gmaj7]glori[Em7]ous And [D]we will always be[A] in [G2]awe of You[Em7] [D2 |D2 |G |G |]
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 joy to the world the lord is come let earth receive her king let every heart prepare him room and heavn and nature sing and heavn and nature sing and heavn and heavn and nature sing verse 2 joy to the world the savior reigns let men their songs employ while fields and floods rocks hills and plains repeat the sounding joy repeat the sounding joy repeat repeat the sounding joy bridge you are my joy you are my joy you are my joy you are my joy you are my joy you are my joy you are my joy you are my joy you are my joy you are my joy you are my joy you are my joy you are my joy you are my joy you are my joy you are my joy verse 3 no more let sins and sorrows grow nor thorns infest the ground he comes to make his blessings flow far as the curse is found far as the curse is found far as far as the curse is found verse 4 he rules the world with truth and grace and makes the nations prove the glories of his righteousness and wonders of his love and wonders of his love and wonders wonders of his love and wonders wonders of his love chorus you are glorious glorious and we will lift our voices to worship you you are glorious glorious and we will always be in awe of you
